verses.verse: The Lord <S%H3068><s%> reigns <S%H4427><s%>; let the earth <S%H776><s%> rejoice <S%H1523><s%>; let the multitude <S%H7227><s%> of islands <S%H339><s%> be glad there <S%H8055><s%>.
Clouds <S%H6051><s%> and darkness <S%H6205><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> him <S%H6664><s%>: righteousness and judgment <S%H4941><s%> are the habitation <S%H4349><s%> of his throne <S%H3678><s%>.
A fire <S%H784><s%> goes <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H3857><s%>, and burns up his enemies <S%H6862><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.
His lightnings <S%H1300><s%> enlightened <S%H215><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%>: the earth <S%H776><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%>, and trembled <S%H2342><s%>.

The hills <S%H2022><s%> melted <S%H4549><s%> like wax <S%H1749><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H113><s%> of the whole earth <S%H776><s%>.
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> declare <S%H5046><s%> his righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> his glory <S%H3519><s%>.

Confounded <S%H954><s%> be all they that serve <S%H5647><s%> engraved images <S%H6459><s%>, that boast <S%H1984><s%> themselves of idols <S%H457><s%>: worship <S%H7812><s%> him <S%H430><s%>, all you gods.

Zion <S%H6726><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%>, and was glad <S%H8055><s%>; and the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> rejoiced <S%H1523><s%> because of your judgments <S%H4941><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
For you <S%H3068><s%>, Lord, are high above <S%H5945><s%> all the earth <S%H776><s%>: you are exalted <S%H5927><s%> far above <S%H3966><s%> all gods <S%H430><s%>.

You that love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, hate <S%H8130><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>: he preserves <S%H8104><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> of his saints <S%H2623><s%>; he delivers <S%H5337><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
Light <S%H216><s%> is sown <S%H2232><s%> for the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, and gladness <S%H8057><s%> for the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%>.
Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, you righteous <S%H6662><s%>; and give thanks <S%H3034><s%> at the memory <S%H2143><s%> of his holiness <S%H6944><s%>.
